title: Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip Cookies from Heaven
method: Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C).
Step 2: Cream together brown sugar and butter. Beat in peanut butter, eggs, and vanilla. Add flour, cornstarch, baking soda, salt, and baking powder. Stir in chocolate chips.
Step 3: Drop 1 1/2 teaspoonfuls of dough 2 inches apart onto ungreased cookie sheets. Flatten slightly because they do not spread much while baking.
Step 4: Bake in the preheated oven for 10 minutes.
